description: Try our easy to follow Cheesy Pasta Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Cheesy Pasta Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook pasta in salted boiling water for 10 minutes or until just tender. Add peas and cook for 1 minute. Drain. Cool.
Cut cheese sticks into strips and place in a large bowl. Add ham, tomatoes, corn kernels, pasta and peas. Toss to combine. Divide among 4 containers. Top each with basil pesto. Seal containers.
